name: Grout
description: A RomM client for NextUI, muOS, and Knulli.
author: K-Wall

changelog.v1.2.0: Platform mapping tweaks, multi-file ROM downloads, bug fixes and more!
changelog.v1.2.1: Quick fix for not evaluating all art paths.
changelog.v1.2.2: Quick fix for not evaluating all art paths.
changelog.v1.2.3: Background art downloads moved to the foreground due to inadvertent early termination.
changelog.v1.2.4: Correct check for the muOS info folder to determine the proper mnt path to use.
changelog.v1.3.3: Added auto updater function for muOS and Knulli plus a number of performance / organizational fixes.
changelog.v1.3.5: Fix auto save sync from hashing files unnecessarily
changelog.v1.3.8: Fixed a boo-boo introduced on NextUI with the new font icons.
changelog.v1.3.9: Tried to be cute with pagination and lost. Fix for Grout not retrieving large ROM collections.
